content:
A new proposal has been announced: #332. It will be
announced at the next meeting to try and draw attention to it,
but usually MCPs are not discussed during triage meetings. If
you think this would benefit from discussion amongst the
team, consider proposing a design meeting.
:thumbs_up:
I started an FCP instead of seconding it because the MCP template says public facing features need an FCP
Hm, afaik this would only be useable on nightly so an ordinary second would have been fine :thinking: doesn't really matter though, does it?
it will be good to get everyone on board anyway
ill also schedule a lang team meeting to discuss the plan of stabilizing this subset

Opened #74877 for now which implements the restrictions we outlined here.

@pnkfelix @Vadim Petrochenkov @nagisa do you have any concerns about this MCP?
